product_name: Benchmade McHenry & Williams Axis Lock Knife
long_description: With the distinctive beauty of a Twist Damasteel blade and carbon handle with blue inlay, the Benchmade McHenry & Williams Axis Lock Knife is made to look good and perform even better. Exquisite collector's knife erases the line between custom and manufactured. Etched Hakkapella Damasteel blade is made with a costly process of forging and layering a variety of steels; offers remarkable toughness and edge quality. Patented AXIS assist makes it easy to open the knife quickly and smoothly with either hand and lock the blade securely into place. Modified clip-point blade with ambidextrous dual thumb-stud opener. Carbon fiber handles with blue C-Tek inlay and anodized blue barrel spacer. The Benchmade McHenry & Williams Axis Lock Knife features full stainless-steel liners and a reversible tip-up pocket clip.
short_description: With the distinctive beauty of a Twist Damasteel blade and carbon handle with blue inlay, the Benchmade McHenry & Williams Axis Lock Knife is made to look good and perform even better.
